query: How many ads had over 1000 clicks on 3 april 2025?
sql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ga.ad_group_ad_ad_id) 
FROM advida-data-pipeline.manager_dataset_preprod_updated.google_ads_ad_group_ads_performance_2643649617 ga 
WHERE ga.customer_id = 3424742100 
AND ga.segments_date = '2025-04-03' 
AND ga.metrics_clicks > 1000
